name: Antikiller
description:
Antikiller is an action-shooter game developed by Qbik Interactive. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Lexicon Entertainment. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Antikiller is available on PC.
It was produced by Viktor Taknov, Vladimir Kilburg and Yusup Bakshiyev. Egor Konchalovsky and Yegor Konchalovsky directed the game.
